definition: any of numerous chiefly North American weedy plants constituting the genus Ambrosia that produce highly allergenic pollen responsible for much hay fever and asthma
details:
noun
- any of numerous chiefly North American weedy plants constituting the genus Ambrosia that produce highly allergenic pollen responsible for much hay fever and asthma
= synonyms: ambrosia
- widespread European weed having yellow daisylike flowers
= synonyms: ragwort, tansy ragwort, benweed
